IMPORTANT: If we want to divide two numbers a and b
column9: we write a / b to get the quotient (example: 5 / 2 is equal to 2). But if we want the remainder
column10: we write a % b (example: 5 % 2 is equal to 1). If the remainder of a % b equals 0
column11: a is divisible by b. If the remainder of a % b does not equal 0
column12: a is not divisible by b. Use this to help you write an if block that checks if namba is divisible by m. is_prime namba
